properties.areaDesc: East Laramie County; Central Laramie County
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 17 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
At 853PM...Cheyenne National Weather Service radar is tracking a
band of moderate snowfall from mile marker 30 on Interstate
25...southeast to mile marker 370 on Interstate 80. This band is
moving south southwest and will arrive in Cheyenne at 915 PM.
Brief moderate snow reducing visibility down to one half mile is
likely with this band of snow and could produce hazardous driving
conditions through 930 pm. If traveling local roads around
Cheyenne...be prepared for sudden reductions in visibility and
slow down until you make it through the snow band.
